body.bibl: Maori, Yeshayahu. “Methodological Criteria for Distinguishing between Variant Vorlage and Exegesis in the Peshitta Pentateuch.” In The Peshitta as a Translation: Papers Read at the II Peshitta Symposium Held at Leiden, 19–21 August 1993, edited by Piet B.
